description:
With H2Core™ Expedition fleece providing unmatched breathability and warmth, you'll stay cozy no matter how long your paddle lasts. Pair with a drysuit to keep you comfortable and protected from the elements.

  • H2Core™ Expedition fleece is moisture wicking, quick drying and as soft as it gets
  • Fabric has built in 4-way mechanical stretch to move with you
  • Chafe free seams for all day paddling comfort
  • Double-pull front zipper for convenient relief and easy entry
  • Stirrups keep legs from riding up and allows easy layering under a drysuit
name: NRS Expedition Weight Union Suit - Women's
